pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Wednesday, June 3, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

The Prime Minister will deliver remarks during the virtual Extraordinary Inter-Sessional Summit of the Heads of State and Government of the Organisation of African, Caribbean, and Pacific States (OACPS).

12:00 p.m.  The Prime Minister will attend the sitting of the Special Committee on the COVID-19 Pandemic.

6:00 p.m.  The Prime Minister will virtually attend the National Caucus meeting.
